body: We’re officially #engaged! I proposed last night, and she said yes! It was such a special moment—we couldn’t be happier! #shesaidyes #love

comments.body: Congratulations! That’s amazing news! How did you propose?
@34343 Thanks! I proposed during a quiet dinner at home. It was just the two of us, and it felt perfect. She had no idea it was coming!
So happy for you both! Did you have the ring picked out for a while, or was it a recent decision?
@45454 I’ve had the ring for a few months now! I was waiting for the right moment, and last night just felt perfect.
That’s incredible! Any immediate wedding plans, or are you just soaking in the engagement for now?
@56565 We’re definitely going to take some time to enjoy the engagement before jumping into wedding planning. No rush!
Congrats! Do you have a date in mind for the wedding, or is it too soon to say?
@67676 Too soon to say! We’re just enjoying the moment right now. We’ll start thinking about dates after the holidays.
Big congratulations to you both! Did you tell your family and friends yet, or are you keeping it a secret for a little while?
@78787 Thank you! We told our families last night, and they’re thrilled! We’ll share the news with friends over the weekend.
